meanings.sent2: Luke is a common name for boys.
meanings.sent3: Luke always makes me laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: In the story, Luke was the hero who saved the day.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget Luke's friendly smile.

meanings.definition: Luke: to warm slightly, as in lukewarm water
meanings.sent1: Please luke the soup before serving.
meanings.sent2: I like to luke my tea to the perfect temperature.
meanings.sent3: She decided to luke her bath water for a cozy soak.
meanings.sent4: The sun began to luke the chilly morning air.
meanings.sent5: The campfire helped luke our cold hands.

meanings.definition: Luke: a book of the New Testament in the Bible
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the Gospel of Luke.
meanings.sent2: Luke is one of the four Gospels in the Bible.
meanings.sent3: The story of Luke in the Bible is full of wisdom.
meanings.sent4: She found comfort in the words of Luke during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The Gospel of Luke teaches important lessons about kindness.
